entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is a Ministry official who is questioning Harry about the sword. He is described as having a badly shaven cheek and scrutinizing Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being questioned by Scrimgeour about the sword. He is struggling to keep his temper.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having decided that the sword should be given to Harry. His motivations for doing so are being questioned by Scrimgeour.

entities.name: godric gryﬃndor
entities.description: Godric Gryﬃndor is mentioned as the owner of the sword that Dumbledore believed could defeat the Heir of Slytherin.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is a house at Hogwarts that has an heir who is being referred to in the conversation.

relationships.description: Dumbledore gave the sword to Harry, as mentioned by Scrimgeour and Harry's response.
Godric Gryﬃndor owned the sword that Dumbledore believed could defeat the Heir of Slytherin.
